con:call.name: Create AE
con:call.con:request:
PROCESS iHub Create Or Update Adverse Event 32225879 tolvenuser nogrid nogrid changeme nocredentials urn:hl7-org:v3 Adverse Event Report Adverse Event Report TestOne Patient Now married site-specific component of clinical trial clinical trial
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has sporadic mild to severe abdominal pain Grade CTCAE Grade 2 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Possible serious reason(s) Results in persistent or significant incapacity or substantial disruption of the ability to conduct normal life functions

con:request.name: ProcessRequest - Create AE
con:request.con:request:
PROCESS iHub Create Or Update Adverse Event 322${date}${index} tolvenuser nogrid nogrid changeme nocredentials urn:hl7-org:v3 Adverse Event Report Adverse Event Report FirstName${date}${index} LastName${date}${index} Now married site-specific component of clinical trial clinical trial
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has sporadic mild to severe abdominal pain Grade CTCAE Grade 2 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Possible serious reason(s) Results in persistent or significant incapacity or substantial disruption of the ability to conduct normal life functions serious reason(s) Requires inpatient hospitalization or prolongation of existing hospitalization
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Ear disorder Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Cushing symptoms Grade CTCAE Grade 2 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Delayed Puberty Grade CTCAE Grade 2 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Growth Accelerated Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Anemia Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Bone marrow hypocellular Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Disseminated intravascular coagulation Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Hemolysis Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Hemolytic uremic syndrome Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Leukocytosis Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Lymph node pain Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Spleen disorder Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Aortic valve disease Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Asystole Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Atrial fibrillation Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Atrioventricular block complete Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has Cardiac arrest Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has External ear pain Grade CTCAE Grade 1 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Definite serious reason(s) Is a congenital abnormality/birth defect

con:loadTest.name: All Success AE Simple Load Test
con:loadTest.con:description: All messages will create participant successfully

con:loadTest.name: All failure AE Simple Load Test
con:loadTest.con:description: All messages will fail create participant. Must be run after All Success load test.
con:loadTest.con:tearDownScript: /* * After running failure load test reset the test case study root and ext to 6482 */ loadTestRunner.loadTest.testCase.setPropertyValue("studyRoot", "6482") loadTestRunner.loadTest.testCase.setPropertyValue("studyExt", "6482")

con:request.name: ProcessRequest - Create AE
con:request.con:request:
PROCESS iHub Create Or Update Adverse Event 322${date}${index} tolvenuser nogrid nogrid changeme nocredentials urn:hl7-org:v3 Adverse Event Report Adverse Event Report FirstName${date}${index} LastName${date}${index} Now married site-specific component of clinical trial clinical trial
Allergies and Adverse Reactions The patient has sporadic mild to severe abdominal pain Grade CTCAE Grade 2 TAC1 Attribution 3 - Possible serious reason(s) Results in persistent or significant incapacity or substantial disruption of the ability to conduct normal life functions

con:loadTest.name: Mixed Success & Failure AE Simple Load Test
con:loadTest.con:description: Mixed messages with success and fail for CPR. Every 3rd msg will fail.
con:loadTest.con:tearDownScript: /* * After running failure load test reset the test case study root and ext to 6482 */ loadTestRunner.loadTest.testCase.setPropertyValue("studyRoot", "6482") loadTestRunner.loadTest.testCase.setPropertyValue("studyExt", "6482")

con:request.name: ProcessRequest - Create AE
con:request.con:request:
? iHub Create Participant Registration 322092000 tolvenuser changeme urn:hl7-org:v3 Registration report Registration report FirstName092000 LastName092000 Now married site-specific component of clinical trial clinical trial
Registration Activity status: active
<text/> <!--no existing CDA template, use result observation template to record additional race. If a patient only has a single race code, then the code should be put to CDA header recordTarget/.../patient/raceCode element--> <entry typeCode="DRIV"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <!--Result observation template--> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2" assigningAuthorityName="HL7 CCDA"/> <id root="0b1f04da-983c-4438-a093-31011a5f9758"/> <code code="103579009" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMED-CT" displayName="race"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1002-5" displayName="American Indian or Alaska Native" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.238" codeSystemName="Race & Ethnicity - CDC"/> </observation> </entry> </section> </component> </structuredBody> </component> </ClinicalDocument> </mes:businessMessagePayload> </mes:request> </mes:caXchangeRequestMessage> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: ProcessRequest - Create AE
con:request.con:request:
? iHub Create Participant Registration 322as1010201201 tolvenuser changeme urn:hl7-org:v3 Registration report Registration report FirstName108 LastName108 Now married site-specific component of clinical trial clinical trial
Registration Activity status: active
<text/> <!--no existing CDA template, use result observation template to record additional race. If a patient only has a single race code, then the code should be put to CDA header recordTarget/.../patient/raceCode element--> <entry typeCode="DRIV"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <!--Result observation template--> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.2" assigningAuthorityName="HL7 CCDA"/> <id root="0b1f04da-983c-4438-a093-31011a5f9758"/> <code code="103579009" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMED-CT" displayName="race"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="1002-5" displayName="American Indian or Alaska Native" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.238" codeSystemName="Race & Ethnicity - CDC"/> </observation> </entry> </section> </component> </structuredBody> </component> </ClinicalDocument> </mes:businessMessagePayload> </mes:request> </mes:caXchangeRequestMessage> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
